scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-static && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] source/app.js -o build/app.js
scripts.test: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] tests/app.js | node | faucet
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy-static && watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] source/app.js -o build/app.js
